column4: Is there a good application I can use to organize a large number of videos? Like how rhythmbox is for audio files. is there a video library application?
i think Miro would do that

erUSUL, gasmask , I can't install Miro thought, there is a conflict with in it with a 3rd party rep I use for VDPAU support. I guess I'll take a look at banshee, forgot to search in sourceforge too , thanks
theres also Mplayer, not sure about libraries though
